## Summary
Describe the issue clearly and concisely.

## Affected files
List the relevant files (RFC section, schema, codebook, etc.).

## Expected behavior
What should happen according to the specification?

## Actual behavior
What happens instead?

## Additional context
Add any other context or references here.
